text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump When the government tells you 140,000 deaths is good news, you need a new government. @realDonaldTrump is not in control of his own administration much less the #coronavirus pandemic, the economy or anything else. Trump is a TOTAL FAILURE on every front #FindSomethingNew
#VoteJoe
